attributes.action: Stop bonus payment for Northern Rock staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A world economic crisis created by banks. The nation has to nationalise one of these banks. The staff get bonused. Insulting to the majority of the nation that are suffereing as a result of incompetent bankers and weak controls from government. No

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
